snippet.title: Otaku's Adventure Mobile Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Otaku's Adventure is coming to mobile on May 18th. Click the link below for the free demo:
https://www.taptap.io/app/233165

Otaku's Adventure is a manga-style visual novel game that follows an eccentric shut-in on his quest to find true love. What should've been just an average day for an otaku becomes an absurd surreal adventure that defies all expectations.
